subject: Vam pro
description_text:
Hello i have  pro X pedal,
I would the 3 vam pro motors, can i choose only the motors without the
power supplies?
The bracket are included ?

Thank you

Matthieu VAILLANT

conversations.body_text: Hi Minkay,  ​The ProX also requires a 24V power supply, and the motor comes with a mounting bracket included.
